title: TransitionTemplate
description: Defines reusable animation and transition patterns for state changes, page navigation, or component lifecycle events. Ensures consistent motion design across the application.

animationType.description: Motion animation category applied during this transition.

duration.description: CSS transition duration (e.g., '300ms', '0.5s'), per CSS Transitions specification.

easing.description: CSS timing function controlling the transition's acceleration curve (e.g., 'ease-in-out', 'cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)').
